name: The King of Thieves
description:
A tiny, retro style, maze game made in Godot 4.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This game was made for Mini Jam 129: Poison. I was trying to do something similar in spirit to the original Zelda game. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art by Lucio Villanueva Oliva olivalu.itch.io

Music by Joshua Hicks instagram.com/jo_sh_uwa/
